article.description: Quadir Welton scored a career-high 27 points on 10-of-12 shooting, Trevis Wyche added 16 points and Saint Peter's beat Boston University 80-67 on Monday night.
article.headline: Welton scores 27, St Peter's beats Boston University 80-67
article.linkText: Welton scores 27, St Peter's beats Boston University 80-67
article.story: JERSEY CITY, N.J. -- Quadir Welton scored a career-high 27 points on 10-of-12 shooting, Trevis Wyche added 16 points and Saint Peter's beat Boston University 80-67 on Monday night. Antwon Potley had 12 points -- all on 3s -- and Chazz Patterson scored 11 for St. Peter's. Patterson hit two 3-pointers and Wyche added a third to make it 30-19 with 7:04 left in the half and St. Peter's (3-2) led the rest of the way. The Terriers twice pulled within three in the second half before a 16-4 run -- during which Wyche made 6-of-6 free throws and scored 10 points -- gave the Peacocks a 16-point lead with 2:50 to play. Kyle Foreman led BU (4-2) with 20 points on 8-of-11 shooting. St. Peter's made 9 of 21 from 3-point range, committed just 10 turnovers and converted 18 Terriers turnovers into 23 points. BU made 5 of 23 (22.7 percent) from behind the arc and just 8 of 14 (57.1 percent) free throws.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
